# TRAVI.World - AI Discovery File
# Version: 1.0
# Updated: January 2026
# Contact: hello@travi.world

## About TRAVI
TRAVI is a comprehensive travel content platform helping travelers discover destinations worldwide. We provide expert travel guides, attraction information, hotel recommendations, dining guides, and real-time travel intelligence across 30 languages.

## Primary Content Categories

### Travel Guides
Complete destination guides with local insights, itineraries, and practical tips.
- Dubai Travel Guide: /en/guides/dubai
- Paris Travel Guide: /en/guides/paris
- Tokyo Travel Guide: /en/guides/tokyo
- New York Travel Guide: /en/guides/new-york
- London Travel Guide: /en/guides/london
- Rome Travel Guide: /en/guides/rome
- Barcelona Travel Guide: /en/guides/barcelona
- Amsterdam Travel Guide: /en/guides/amsterdam
- Singapore Travel Guide: /en/guides/singapore
- Bangkok Travel Guide: /en/guides/bangkok

### Attractions
Comprehensive information about tourist attractions, landmarks, and experiences.
- All Attractions: /en/attractions
- Dubai Attractions: /en/destinations/dubai/attractions

### Hotels
Curated hotel recommendations and booking information.
- Hotel Listings: /en/hotels

### Dining
Restaurant guides and culinary experiences.
- Dining Guide: /en/dining

### Destinations
City and country destination pages with travel essentials.
- All Destinations: /en/destinations
- Dubai: /en/destinations/dubai
- Paris: /en/destinations/paris
- Tokyo: /en/destinations/tokyo
- New York: /en/destinations/new-york

## Supported Languages (30 locales)
English (en), Arabic (ar), Hindi (hi), Chinese (zh), Russian (ru), Urdu (ur), French (fr), German (de), Persian (fa), Bengali (bn), Filipino (fil), Spanish (es), Turkish (tr), Italian (it), Japanese (ja), Korean (ko), Hebrew (he), Portuguese (pt), Dutch (nl), Polish (pl), Swedish (sv), Thai (th), Vietnamese (vi), Indonesian (id), Malay (ms), Czech (cs), Greek (el), Danish (da), Norwegian (no), Romanian (ro), Hungarian (hu), Ukrainian (uk)

## URL Structure
All content is available in 30 languages using the pattern:
/{locale}/{content-type}/{slug}

Examples:
- English: /en/guides/dubai
- Arabic: /ar/guides/dubai
- French: /fr/guides/dubai
- Japanese: /ja/guides/dubai

## Key Features
- Native multilingual content (not machine translated)
- RTL support for Arabic, Hebrew, Persian, Urdu
- Comprehensive travel intelligence
- Real-time attraction information
- Expert local recommendations

## Structured Data
All pages include JSON-LD structured data:
- WebPage schema with inLanguage
- BreadcrumbList for navigation
- FAQPage for Q&A content
- TouristAttraction for attraction pages
- Article for news and guides

## API Access
Public API documentation: /api/docs (Swagger UI)
Note: API endpoints require authentication for write operations.

## Contact
Website: https://travi.world
Email: hello@travi.world

## Legal
Terms of Service: /en/terms
Privacy Policy: /en/privacy
